```{=html}
<style>
/* Responsive author grid */
.authors {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(260px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.25rem;
  align-items: start;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

/* Card styling */
.author-card {
  background: var(--bs-body-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--bs-border-color);
  border-radius: 1.25rem;
  padding: 1.25rem;
  text-align: center;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.06);
}

/* Circular portraits */
.portrait {
  width: 140px;
  height: 140px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  object-fit: cover;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,.08);
  margin: 0 auto 0.75rem;
  display: block;
}

/* Text styles */
.author-name {
  font-size: 1.15rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: .15rem;
}
.role {
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: .25rem;
}
.affil {
  opacity: .85;
  margin: 0;
}

/* Optional social links row */
.social a {
  margin: .25rem .35rem;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: .95rem;
}

/* Nice hover */
.author-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  transition: transform .15s ease;
}
</style>
```
